title: West Pakistan Juvenile Smoking (Repeal) Act, 2018
description: Official consolidated text of West Pakistan Juvenile Smoking (Repeal) Act, 2018 (XXXIX of 2018) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement. (1) This Act may be called the West Pakistan Juvenile
provisions.content:
Smoking (Repeal) Act, 2018.
(2) It shall come into force at once in its applicability to the extent of Islamabad Capital
Territory.
